title: Episode 95 (video): Mnemonics Advanced: The Pegword System Part 1
description: Did you know there's a mnemonic device that is more powerful than the  One is a bun pegword mnemonic?  Here's a system you can use for lists that have more than 12 items.  In this video I show you the advanced pegword mnemonic system in which every number becomes a letter and a concrete word that you can visualize to help you remember a list of any length.  See how to put mental imagery and your memory to work in this video.
